languages.text: Each stack increases this creature's chance to be critically hit by +1% and reduces its Perception and Willpower by −2.

traits.locale_text: Targets under this effect have 1% increased chance to be critically hit for every stack and their Perception and Willpower are reduceed by -2 for every stack. Every time an enemy is takes damage from an attack, stacks of this effect increase by 1.
